mapper.select: SELECT A.imgad_name, A.imgad_period, A.imgad_price, B.imgad_pmtno, B.imgad_no, B.company_id, C.company_nm, B.pmt_methdno, B.imgad_pdate, TO_CHAR(B.imgad_sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgad_sdate, TO_CHAR(B.imgad_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgad_edate, B.imgad_bprice, B.imgad_result, B.imgad_title, B.imgad_content, B.imgad_file, B.imgad_loc FROM imgadpay B, imgadmnmt A, company C WHERE B.imgad_no = A.imgad_no AND B.imgad_result = 'W' AND B.company_id = C.company_id

SELECT A.imgad_name, A.imgad_period, A.imgad_price, B.imgad_pmtno, B.imgad_no, B.company_id, C.company_nm, B.pmt_methdno, B.imgad_pdate, TO_CHAR(B.imgad_sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgad_sdate, TO_CHAR(B.imgad_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgad_edate, B.imgad_bprice, B.imgad_result, B.imgad_title, B.imgad_content, B.imgad_file, B.imgad_loc FROM imgadpay B, imgadmnmt A, company C WHERE B.imgad_no = A.imgad_no AND B.imgad_result = 'N' AND B.company_id = C.company_id

SELECT A.imgad_name, A.imgad_period, A.imgad_price, B.imgad_pmtno, B.imgad_no, B.company_id, C.company_nm, B.pmt_methdno, B.imgad_pdate, TO_CHAR(B.imgad_sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgad_sdate, TO_CHAR(B.imgad_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgad_edate, B.imgad_bprice, B.imgad_result, B.imgad_title, B.imgad_content, B.imgad_file, B.imgad_loc FROM imgadpay B, imgadmnmt A, company C WHERE B.imgad_no = A.imgad_no AND B.imgad_result = 'Y' AND B.company_id = C.company_id
mapper.update: UPDATE imgadpay SET imgad_result = 'N' WHERE imgad_pmtno = #{imgadPmtno}
UPDATE imgadpay SET imgad_result = 'Y' WHERE imgad_pmtno = #{imgadPmtno}
UPDATE imgadpay SET imgad_result = 'W' WHERE imgad_pmtno = #{imgadPmtno}
mapper.select: SELECT P.point_pmtno, P.users_id, U.users_nm, T.ticket_name, P.ticket_no, P.pmt_methdno, P.point_pdate, P.point_hold, P.point_charge, P.point_use, P.point_remain, P.point_record FROM pointpay P JOIN users U ON P.users_id = U.users_id JOIN ticketmnmt T ON P.ticket_no = T.ticket_no WHERE P.pmt_methdno IS NULL

SELECT P.imgad_pmtno, P.imgad_no, P.company_id, P.pmt_methdno, P.imgad_pdate, P.imgad_sdate, P.imgad_edate, P.imgad_bprice, P.imgad_result, P.imgad_title, P.imgad_content, P.imgad_file, P.imgad_loc, C.company_nm, A.imgad_name FROM imgadpay P JOIN imgadmnmt A ON P.imgad_no = A.imgad_no JOIN company C ON P.company_id = C.company_id

SELECT p.cmpad_pmtno, p.cmpad_no, p.company_id, p.pmt_methdno, p.cmpad_pdate, p.cmpad_sdate, p.cmpad_edate, p.cmpad_bprice, C.company_nm, A.cmpad_name FROM cmpadpay p JOIN cmpadmnmt A ON P.cmpad_no = A.cmpad_no JOIN company C ON P.company_id = C.company_id
